name: SE2-02 — TIDE-BASIN RUNES
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Ros Sodyer Rock Pool (Anse Takamaka, Mahé). When the ocean exhales, stone remembers.
Read the runes in the pool; they point by night, not day.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare
Ros Sodyer Rock Pool (Anse Takamaka, Mahé)

properties.cipher: runes form an arc aligned to a bearing notch; tri-star overlay.
properties.clue:
When the ocean exhales, stone remembers.
Read the runes in the pool; they point by night, not day.
properties.visual_description: Circular tide pool at low tide; faint runes under water. Pirate hand + cutlass reflected; parrot feather on driftwood. Constellation of three stars traced in ripples.
